abstract: Stephen Ruth of Centereach, NY, is arrested and charged with criminal tampering and obstructing governmental administration for redirecting red-light cameras towards sky and posting video of actions online; case draws new attention to controversial issue of cameras that photograph cars running red lights so tickets can later be sent to owners; many communities around country have discontinued camera programs due to public disapproval and unclear safety benefits.
lead_paragraph: A driver on Long Island was charged with tampering after the police said he used a pole to redirect several red-light cameras toward the sky and posted a video of himself moving them.

headline.main: Charges Filed Against Long Island Man Involved in Red-Light Camera Case
